data.text: @6ft_20 @25th_Prestige Why do you feel the need to "back" either one?  Most of us don't have a dog in the fight, they're both bad for different reasons. https://t.co/4BmEDIUsLF
@25th_Prestige TV is the god in their religion. the messengers/prophets are on the channels they watch. Now they're just on a new chapter in the series of sermons.
@25th_Prestige @DempMcgee This lady is nuts. She is a major Dem boot licker.

@JaseTxRi @25th_Prestige 1. I don't know what "it" is
2. If this ends with Russia and China having a large sphere or authoritarian influence, then I'm ok with the political ramifications of a sovereign Ukraine.

@6ft_20 @25th_Prestige "Even if it's true"...of course it's relevant. 

And secondly...it has nothing to do with doing the opposite of libs. It has everything to do with us having seen this show b4 and not liking how it ends.

@La78Tomking @25th_Prestige You can try and slap lefties because they're pro-ukraine by engaging in dubious claims about the character of the Ukrainian president, but Russia has started a hostile takeover based on blatant propaganda. I can't believe people buy it.

@25th_Prestige What is the point of calling Zelenskyy a bad actor? How is that relevant even if it's true? It seems like RW twitter is watching the left back Ukraine and reacting by doing the opposite. I'm extremely conservative but Ukraine is an easy side to back regardless of the libs.

@bjornhellwalker @PoptartReborn @SgtJoker762FMJ @25th_Prestige Now they believe that since Russia has been banned from most platforms that all the noise from "Russian trolls" has quieted the platforms.
